name: Fighter Combat: Shadow Kung Fu
description:
Need to fight for life?? Enter in the world of the blood-burning fighting club. Are you professional enough to control a giant fighter in fighting games?? Face and beat new fighting opponents and prove yourself over a karate fighting style adventure arcade offline game to enjoy with ultimate 3d experience. By using clever tactics with all challenges anime fighter game and defeat them badly in real blood pumping shadow fighting challenges.
Upgrade your power, speed, and accuracy with a tra training mode to create new strikes and legend style to make move jab, hook a, nd uppercut, getting points for each winning match you can upgrade your karate fighting skills. Battle against powerful rivals, win them over, and earn points to unlock new ranks of your progression. Response rapidly to every move of your enemy and show your top-level skills to overcome your competitors with your fighter’s power. unleash fierce punch boxing and combos, beat all challengers, and become the king of the fighting game.
Fighting games in-involve close-quarter battles between characters. Some of the battles involve the use of weapons, martial art, and street fighting techniques. career game involved which can be played in multiplayer and tournament which are coming soon.
Features for fighting game
• Select and modify your own fighter in the fighting game
• Free offline game
• Get promotion by defeating king fighter tournament legends
• Battle against toughest fighters and become fighting gaming champion
• Unlimited level mode & career mode challenges
• Win fighting games matches & get rewarded points to unlock the next levels
• Background music & sound effects will increase your energy in fighting levels.


What are you waiting for?? Let’s continue passion and blood at the same time.
